description:
Very short canyon, but really nice narrow section.

Approach

Park at Fafleralp (7.- CHF per day) and walk towards the Langgletscher. Then turn left into the Jegital until you reach a small bridge over this minicanyon.

Descent

Some small rappels and jumps with beautiful rocks. To bad that it is over so quickly ... Glacier above the canyon, so the waterlevel is increasing during the day.

Exit

Same way as approach.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
name: Jegibach
